creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Helmet for general's costume, theatrical, of silvered metal with gold-plated flanges. Three gold and black brocade flaps, brass-studded, hang down at sides and back. A large spike, decorated with pearl beads, fur, and dragon-painted feathers, emerges from
medium: Silk brocade, gold metals, pearls, fur, feathers
title: Manchu Military Officer's Ceremonial Helmet
